description:
This course is a basic introduction to the world of Programmable Logic Controllers. Specifically, this course introduces the use of the PIB [PLC-in-A-Box] and the Allen Bradley Micro_Logix 1000 controller and associated hardware and software.

Course Outline:

Chapter 1: Intro to the PIB

Chapter 2: Setting Drivers for the PIB

Chapter 3: Verifying Communication with the PIB

Chapter 4: The PIB Software Overview

Chapter 5: Selecting the PIB Processor

Chapter 6: The PIB Basic Commands Library

Chapter 7: The PIB Software Data Files

Chapter 8: The PIB First Project

Chapter 9: Documenting the First PIB Project

Chapter 10: Testing the First PIB Project
title: Introduction to PLC's [Programmable Logic Controllers]
